title: The Deck Of Few Things
desc:
Post 1909
- While this is in your hand, any cards you draw will be non-<:deck:1106732963577729055> cards.
- In addition, you may freely transform any <:deck:1106732963577729055> cards in your hand into random non-<:deck:1106732963577729055> cards at any point, no turn required. (any statuses attached to the cards carry over)
